Articles.Content:
I think a good idea could be having the Russian vs. American space race as a multiplayer or player vs. AI scenario or payer style.

the idea would be to gather science and funding to be able to get to the moon faster than the opposing team, this wouldn't be historically accurate as both of the teams have an equal chance of winning, as of this it would use the normal play style but would be about completing the list of missions first be for the opposing player.
This has been suggested so much it is on the WNTS list- Multiplayer is a long-term goal for KSP so you could just roleplay it
